definition: "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Context is the most frequently studied theme in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 语境是当前语用学研究的一个热点。

sentences.english: You are only being examined on this semester's work.
sentences.chinese: 现在只考你在本学期学的课程。

sentences.english: Babies tumble when they are learning to walk.
sentences.chinese: 幼儿在学走路时常常跌倒。

sentences.english: However some grownup parents never figure out how to talk to a child.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多家长怎么也学不会正确地和孩子交谈。

sentences.english: In this paper , the structure of macromaterialogy is discussed and the branching of technological sciences is considered.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论宏观材料学的结构，并思考技术科学的分支。

sentences.english: We’re learning about the fermentation process.
sentences.chinese: 目前我们在学发酵过程。

sentences.english: An application of data mining in the research of TCM syndrome theories.
sentences.chinese: 数据挖掘技术在中医证候学研究中的应用。

sentences.english: Speech acts are the important field in pragmatics.
sentences.chinese: 言语行为是语用学研究的一个重要领域。

sentences.english: Suzhou learn English where? World international English your best choice.
sentences.chinese: 苏州学英语哪里去？沃尔得国际英语你的最好选择。

sentences.english: He enjoys pretending to be you, Sergeant.
sentences.chinese: 警官，他崇拜你，很喜欢学你。

sentences.english: Wasn't it quite tough to get into that course in UCLA?
sentences.chinese: 能进到UCLA学这门课很难吧？

sentences.english: Even non-school days, they would have little success.
sentences.chinese: 即便是天才不学，也不会有多大的成就。

sentences.english: To learn to type, seldom at ordinary times used phoneticize also was collected rise.
sentences.chinese: 为了学打字，平时不常用的拼音也捡了起来。

sentences.english: Scribbling can help infants and toddlers learn to draw and express themselves.
sentences.chinese: 狂草可以帮助婴幼儿学画画和表达自己。

sentences.english: In the knowledge that learned during school can say basically otiose .
sentences.chinese: 在校期间学了的知识，可以说基本上没有用的。

definition: to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)
to study sth to apply it/study for practical applications
junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]
